name: Flightdetails
0:
”Alexa open flight details for Lufthansa number 115”
”Alexa ask flight details for Lufthansa number 2078”
”Alexa ask flight details”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flight details
des:
Flight Details gives you real time flight status of major airlines departing on the day that you make your request. You can easily get information if your flight is cancelled or what departure gate is. Just tell alexa your full flight number, for example, you can say: "Alexa, flight details for lufthansa Number 123" 
Currently support all major airlines!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
